channel.title: Aplication help
channel.description: [i][b]what would i have to do to put my server and client into an aplication like the one 2speced has???[/b][/i]

item.title: Aplication help
item.dc:creator: @jordisun jordisun
item.description:
@jordisun wrote:

[quote][It isnt a great idea but first you need to put the server and client files into a jar archive and then convert it to exe
Or… you could make a simple program in VB or even C++ to load up your jar files./quote]

[b]could i have a link to one of these programs ;D

and are they free, trial based, or do you have to pay?[/b] :o

Read full topic

item.title: Aplication help
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

It isnt a great idea but first you need to put the server and client files into a jar archive and then convert it to exe
Or… you could make a simple program in VB or even C++ to load up your jar files.
